scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run --prefix atm-api start" "npm run --prefix atm-app start"
scripts.dev:install: concurrently --kill-others "npm install" "npm run --prefix atm-api dev:install" "npm run --prefix atm-app dev:install"
scripts.update: concurrently --kill-others "npm update && npm install" "npm run --prefix atm-api update" "npm run --prefix atm-app update"
